```{r}
DataManagment <- select(HumanImpact, siteid:seapscore_id,HAB_quality,FHI_herbivory,FHI_recreation,AC_culturalSignificance,FHI_flowRegulation, AQ_persistence,FHI_humanImpactRiskScore,meanConditionScore)
```

```{r}
DataNoManagment <- select(JeriOriginalDataBase, siteid:seapscore_id,HAB_quality,FHI_herbivory,FHI_recreation,AC_culturalSignificance,FHI_flowRegulation, AQ_persistence,meanConditionScore, meanConditionRiskScore,FHI_humanImpactRiskScore)
```

```{r}
BiodiversityHabitat <- DataManagment %>% filter(HAB_quality>=4 & HAB_quality<=6) %>% drop_na(HAB_quality)

Ranching <- DataManagment %>% filter(FHI_herbivory>=0 & FHI_herbivory<=5) %>% drop_na(FHI_herbivory)


Recreation <- DataManagment %>% filter(FHI_recreation>=4 & FHI_recreation<=6) %>% drop_na(FHI_recreation)


Cultural <- DataManagment %>% filter(AC_culturalSignificance>=2 & AC_culturalSignificance<=6) %>% drop_na(AC_culturalSignificance)


Municipal <- DataManagment %>% filter(FHI_flowRegulation>=0 & FHI_flowRegulation<=5) %>% drop_na(FHI_flowRegulation)



Flow <- DataManagment %>% filter(AQ_persistence>=2 & AQ_persistence<=6)

                         
```

```{r}
write.csv(Ranching, "Ranching.csv")
write.csv(BiodiversityHabitat, "BiodiversityHabitat.csv")
write.csv(Recreation, "Recreation.csv")
write.csv(Cultural, "cultural.csv")
write.csv(Municipal, "Municipal.csv")
write.csv(Flow, "Flow.csv")
```
